entry.title: Ultrasonic Hand-Blown Glass Diffuser - Amber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mountain Wellness Products
Type:
Price: 85.00

These beautiful works of art can easily serve as centerpieces.  Add tap water and the essential oil of your choice to purify, energize, and freshen the air in your home or office.  Be sure to follow our safety guidelines.  Created by the world's largest manufacturer of ultrasonic diffusers, backed by a 1-year warranty, and customer service line, you can be confident in your purchase.

Run Time

Up to 5 hrs.

Actual Unit Size (L" X W" X H")

5″ X 5″ X 8.5″

Capacity

150 mL

Misting Modes

Continuous / Off

Light Modes

White Dimming

Color Change

N/A

Coverage Up To (Sq. Ft.)

1000

Auto Sensor Shut Off

Yes

Power

100 – 240V AC

entry.title: Ultrasonic Car Diffuser/Humidifier
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mountain Wellness Products
Type: Diffuser
Price: 24.95

Easy and convenient way to bring essential oils with you on the road!  The basin rotates to accommodate nearly every style of 12V car socket.  If yours doesn't fit, contact us about a refund.

Keep your senses sharp and your passengers safe with these stimulating oils:

Grapefruit and Peppermint work wonderfully. Some others that work well include: Spearmint, Eucalyptus, Frankincense, Bergamot, Orange, Lemon, Lime and other citrus.  And still other oils that may help include: Basil, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Petitgrain, Black Pepper, Coriander, and Juniper.

Fill basin with water.  Add 1 - 3 drops of oil of your choosing per hour.  It is recommended to ventilate between doses of essential oil.  Do not dilute oils that you plan to use in a diffuser.  See safety information for the essential oil before diffusing it in a vehicle

- Water tank capacity: 50ML.
- Working voltage: DC 12V.
- Working Current: 130mA - 150mA.
- Frequency: 1.5W - 2W.
- Spray volume: 25ML / hour.

Features: Auto shut off after 2 hours, Adjustable, Durable, Portable
Material: ABS, Electronic Components, Plastic
